Room.Name: Neilian Drive
Room.ShortDescription: You are walking along Neilian Drive, just south of the river Othax.
Room.LongDescription: The river Othax, to the north, is not a very vigorous river, but brings much of the fresh water Oceancrest needs to survive, in from the mountains to the east. On the south side of the road, you can see the mysterious Shrine of Gruumsh.
